title: Ep273 Narcissists
description:
This week, the gals take a long look in the mirror to analyze some real egomaniacs. Topics include "the good kind," a Playboy murder, and a glimpse into the most disgusting internet forums. Get yourself some Gals Rosé, don't fall into that pond, and tune in for Narcissists.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
